channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Threads now lets you approve and filter your replies
item.description: While Threads already offers tools that let you limit replies to people you follow, your followers, or people you mention, the new feature allows you ...

item.title: Google partners with Ambani’s Reliance to offer free AI Pro access to millions of Jio users in India
item.description: The offer will first roll out to Jio users aged 18 to 25 before expanding to all subscribers nationwide.

item.title: Bevel raises $10M Series A from General Catalyst for its AI health companion
item.description: Bevel's AI health companion unifies data from wearables and daily habits across sleep, fitness, and nutrition into personalized insights.

item.title: 5 Best Smart Christmas Lights of 2025: From Twinkly to Govee
item.description: Control these smart lights with a voice command or a tap on your phone. Now that’s a Christmas miracle.

item.title: No, SNAP Benefits Aren’t Mostly Used by Immigrants
item.description: SNAP benefits are set to run out on Saturday. Far-right influencers and extremists are incorrectly claiming that immigrants are the main recipients of...

item.title: Canva launches its own design model, adds new AI features to the platform
item.description: Canva is launching new features like Forms and email design, and it makes Affinity free for all users.

item.title: Google partners with Ambani’s Reliance to offer free AI Pro access to millions of Jio users in India
item.description: U.S. tech giants increasingly view India as the next big frontier — a place to gather diverse data, refine models, and test AI use cases that could la...

item.title: A New Startup Wants to Edit Human Embryos
item.description: Seven years after the first gene-edited babies were revealed, biotech startup Manhattan Genomics is reviving the idea of editing human embryos to make...

item.title: Figma acquires AI-powered media generation company Weavy
item.description: Figma said that Weavy will exist as a stand-alone product for now and that, in the future, it will be integrated with the Figma Weave brand, along wit...

item.title: NASA's Quiet Supersonic Jet Takes Flight
item.description: The X-59 successfully completed its inaugural flight—a step toward developing quieter supersonic jets that could one day fly customers more than twice...
